# Perceptron

Digital inputs and output:

* w - weight vector
* x - input vector
* b - threshold

$$ 
f(x_{i..j}) = 
\begin{cases} 
  0 & \text{if } w \cdot  x + b \leq 0  \\
  1 & \text{if } w \cdot x + b  > 0
\end{cases}
$$

# Sigmoid neurons

Analog inputs and output

$$
output = \sigma(w \cdot x + b)
$$

$$
\sigma(z) = \frac{1}{1 + e^{-z}}
$$

Learning and test database: http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/


# Dot Product
2 vectors a, b


$$
a \cdot b = \sum_{i=1}^{n}a_ib_i
$$

# Example

```{r}
sigmoid <- function(x) {
  1 / (1 + exp(-x))
}

sigmoid_neuron <- function(w, x, b) {
  sigmoid(w %*% x + b)
}

sigmoid_neuron(
  c(1,0,0,0),
  c(0.75,0,0,0),
  1
)

```
